section.title: Toolbox.Core.Abstractions.IInstrumentedService Interface Reference

para.para: Interface for services that expose OpenTelemetry instrumentation.

listitem.para: Gets the System.Diagnostics.ActivitySource for distributed tracing.
Gets the System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Meter for metrics collection.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Interface for services that expose OpenTelemetry instrumentation.
Services implementing this interface provide access to their telemetry primitives, enabling consistent observability across the application.
The ActivitySource is used for distributed tracing, while the Meter is used for metrics collection.

Property Documentation
ActivitySource ActivitySourceToolbox.Core.Abstractions.IInstrumentedService Toolbox.Core.Abstractions.IInstrumentedServiceActivitySource
ActivitySource Toolbox.Core.Abstractions.IInstrumentedService.ActivitySource[get]
Gets the System.Diagnostics.ActivitySource for distributed tracing.
The activity source used to create spans for this service.
Activities created from this source will be included in traces when OpenTelemetry tracing is configured.
Implemented in Toolbox.Core.Base.BaseDisposableService.
Definition at line 31 of file IInstrumentedService.cs.
Meter MeterToolbox.Core.Abstractions.IInstrumentedService Toolbox.Core.Abstractions.IInstrumentedServiceMeter
Meter Toolbox.Core.Abstractions.IInstrumentedService.Meter[get]
Gets the System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Meter for metrics collection.
The meter used to create instruments for this service.
Instruments created from this meter will report metrics when OpenTelemetry metrics is configured.
Implemented in Toolbox.Core.Base.BaseDisposableService.
